aka: Magical Mystery or the Return of Karl Schmidt

cast.name: 德特勒夫·布克 Detlev Buck

director.name: 阿尔内·菲尔杜森 Arne Feldhusen

this_title: Magical Mystery oder die Rückkehr des Karl Schmidt
trans_title: 神奇奥妙或卡尔施密特的回归
Magical Mystery or the Return of Karl Schmidt
introduction: Hamburg in the mid-1990s: following a breakdown and a stay in a psychiatric ward, Charly Schmidt lives in assisted accommodation in Hamburg. He’s kicked his alcohol and drug habit when he meets old friends from Berlin, who now earn a lot of money as music producers. Instead of his prescribed holiday in the Lüneburg Heath, Charly takes a job with them: he’ll drive their tour bus...
chinese_title: 神奇奥妙或卡尔施密特的回归
foreign_title: Magical Mystery oder die Rückkehr des Karl Schmidt
